long_description: The women's Sherpani Wisdom Tote Bag gives you urban styling without pretension for carrying gear to the gym or yoga studio. Roomy gym tote has pockets for shoes, towel and clothes. Soft yet durable nylon/polyester fabric is washable; interior is floral lined and has a phone organizer. Exterior pockets organize small stuff; 2 can hold water bottles. Sherpani Wisdom Tote Bag features an adjustable shoulder strap as well as long handles for carry options.
short_description: The women's Sherpani Wisdom Tote Bag gives you urban styling without pretension for carrying gear to the gym or yoga studio.
